command.name: AOP
command.syntax: /msg chanserv AOP <#channel> ADD <nick> /msg chanserv AOP <#channel> DEL <nick | index#> /msg ChanServ AOP <#channel> LIST
command.desc: This command is an alias to the ADDOP, DELOP, and LISTOP facilties except that it manipulates only ops at level 5 (AutoOp).
command.section: This command is provided for interface compatibility with services systems in use by other IRC networks.
(see /msg chanserv help listop, /msg chanserv help addop, and /msg chanserv help delop)

ex.pre: To grant Carlton level 5 op status on #sorcery
